transformations.name: MapDrifted2
transformations.description: Crée un mappage explicite pour chaque colonne dérivée

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{affecte/non_affecte} as string,
		{plateforme/vente directe} as string,
		{origine de la ligne} as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		{Code client livré} as string,
		{code client plateforme livree} as string,
		{code produit} as string,
		quantite as string,
		ca as string,
		{Code postal du client livré} as string,
		marque as string,
		{ID marque} as string,
		{ID canal de distribution} as string,
		{Nom du canal} as string,
		{Diffus/Chantier} as string,
		{document_vente (vente directe)} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé (vente directe)} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre (vente directe)} as string,
		{Facture (vente directe)} as string,
		{Type poste Facture (vente directe)} as string,
		{Numéro offre} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé (vente directe)} as string,
		{ATC offre} as string,
		{ATC livré} as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Motif commande (vente directe)} as string,
		{Type de facture (vente directe)} as string,
		N1groupe as string,
		N2groupe as string,
		N3groupe as string,
		N4groupe as string,
		N5groupe as string,
		N6groupe as string,
		N7groupe as string,
		N1groupedesignation as string,
		N2groupedesignation as string,
		N3groupedesignation as string,
		N4groupedesignation as string,
		N5groupedesignation as string,
		N6groupedesignation as string,
		N7groupedesignation as string,
		N1localedesignation as string,
		N2localedesignation as string,
		N3localedesignation as string,
		N4localedesignation as string,
		N5localedesignation as string,
		N6localedesignation as string,
		N7localedesignation as string,
		N1locale as string,
		N2locale as string,
		N3locale as string,
		N4locale as string,
		N5locale as string,
		N6locale as string,
		N7locale as string,
		{Hiérarchgroupe} as string,
		{Hiérarchlocale} as string,
		{Numéro du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Nom du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{EPS_Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string,
		{EPS_Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string,
		Client as string,
		{Numéro client indirect} as string,
		CODE_CMI as string,
		NOM_CMI as string,
		{Nom du compte} as string,
		{Client Indirect_ Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{Client Indirect_ Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string,
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> baseCommerciale
source(output(
		NoATC as string,
		ATC as string,
		DRCde as string,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> secteurFictif
source(output(
		{Agence commerciale} as string,
		{ATC Client} as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		{Niveau 1} as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		{Niveau 2} as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		{Niveau 3} as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Client as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Rue as string,
		{Dép} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		{Localité} as string,
		{Téléphone 1} as string,
		{Numéro de télécopie} as string,
		{Attribut 2} as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Email as string,
		SIRET as string,
		{Niveau 4} as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		{Groupe de clients} as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		{Groupe de clients 5} as string,
		Column_27 as string,
		{Attribut 1} as string,
		Column_29 as string,
		{Attribut 3} as string,
		Column_31 as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		Column_33 as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Column_35 as string,
		Payeur as string,
		Column_37 as string,
		{Témoin suppr. Tous domaines} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		Column_40 as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		Column_42 as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		Column_44 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtractionSAP
source(output(
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		DR as string,
		{Code postal} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> refAtcinput
source(output(
		{Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Nom du compte} as string,
		{Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string,
		{Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		Ville as string,
		{Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
nullToEmpty, endSecteurFictifs join(replace({ATC offre}, " ", "") == replace(NoATC, " ", ""),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> atcOffreINNER
baseCommerciale, endSecteurFictifs join(replace({ATC offre}, " ", "") == replace(NoATC, " ", ""),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> atcOffreFULLLEFT
DerivedColumn1 filter(isNull(NoATC)) ~> atcOffreOUTERLEFT
atcOffreINNER derive({ATC fictif offre} = 1) ~> updateATCOffre
baseCommerciale derive({ATC offre} = iif(isNull({ATC offre}), "", {ATC offre}),
		{ATC Corrigé (vente directe)} = iif(isNull({ATC Corrigé (vente directe)}), "", {ATC Corrigé (vente directe)})) ~> nullToEmpty
updateATCOffre, atcOffreOUTERLEFT union(byName: true)~> atcOffreTraite
deleteSecteurColumn, endSecteurFictifs join(replace({ATC Corrigé (vente directe)}, " ", "") == replace(NoATC, " ", ""),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> atcCorrigeINNER
deleteSecteurColumn, endSecteurFictifs join(replace({ATC Corrigé (vente directe)}, " ", "") == replace(NoATC, " ", ""),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> atcCorrigeFULLLEFT
atcCorrigeFULLLEFT filter(isNull(NoATC)) ~> atcCorrigeOUTERLEFT
Select5 select(mapColumn(
		{affecte/non_affecte},
		{plateforme/vente directe},
		{origine de la ligne},
		year,
		month,
		{Code client livré},
		{code client plateforme livree},
		{code produit},
		quantite,
		ca,
		{Code postal du client livré},
		marque,
		{ID marque},
		{ID canal de distribution},
		{Nom du canal},
		{Diffus/Chantier},
		{document_vente (vente directe)},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé (vente directe)},
		{Donneur d'ordre (vente directe)},
		{Facture (vente directe)},
		{Type poste Facture (vente directe)},
		{Numéro offre},
		{ATC Corrigé (vente directe)},
		{ATC offre},
		{ATC livré},
		{ATC Performance},
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Motif commande (vente directe)},
		{Type de facture (vente directe)},
		N1groupe,
		N2groupe,
		N3groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N1groupedesignation,
		N2groupedesignation,
		N3groupedesignation,
		N4groupedesignation,
		N5groupedesignation,
		N6groupedesignation,
		N7groupedesignation,
		N1localedesignation,
		N2localedesignation,
		N3localedesignation,
		N4localedesignation,
		N5localedesignation,
		N6localedesignation,
		N7localedesignation,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		{Hiérarchgroupe},
		{Hiérarchlocale},
		{Numéro du compte},
		{EPS_Nom du compte},
		{EPS_Groupe cible/Typologie générale},
		{EPS_Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée},
		{EPS_Compte principal: Numéro du compte},
		{EPS_Compte principal: Nom du compte},
		Client,
		{Numéro client indirect},
		CODE_CMI,
		NOM_CMI,
		{Nom du compte},
		{Client Indirect_ Groupe cible/Typologie générale},
		{Client Indirect_ Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée},
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Numéro du compte},
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Nom du compte},
		{ATC fictif offre}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> deleteSecteurColumn
atcCorrigeINNER derive({ATC fictif Corrigé} = 1) ~> updateATCCorrige
Select4, updateATCCorrige union(byName: true)~> atcCorrigetraite
deleteColumns select(mapColumn(
		{affecte/non_affecte},
		{plateforme/vente directe},
		{origine de la ligne},
		year,
		month,
		{Code client livré},
		{code client plateforme livree},
		{code produit},
		quantite,
		ca,
		{Code postal du client livré},
		marque,
		{ID marque},
		{ID canal de distribution},
		{Nom du canal},
		{Diffus/Chantier},
		{document_vente (vente directe)},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé (vente directe)},
		{Donneur d'ordre (vente directe)},
		{Facture (vente directe)},
		{Type poste Facture (vente directe)},
		{Numéro offre},
		{ATC Corrigé (vente directe)},
		{ATC offre},
		{ATC livré},
		{ATC Performance},
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Motif commande (vente directe)},
		{Type de facture (vente directe)},
		N1groupe,
		N2groupe,
		N3groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N1groupedesignation,
		N2groupedesignation,
		N3groupedesignation,
		N4groupedesignation,
		N5groupedesignation,
		N6groupedesignation,
		N7groupedesignation,
		N1localedesignation,
		N2localedesignation,
		N3localedesignation,
		N4localedesignation,
		N5localedesignation,
		N6localedesignation,
		N7localedesignation,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		{Hiérarchgroupe},
		{Hiérarchlocale},
		{Numéro du compte},
		{EPS_Nom du compte},
		{EPS_Groupe cible/Typologie générale},
		{EPS_Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée},
		{EPS_Compte principal: Numéro du compte},
		{EPS_Compte principal: Nom du compte},
		Client,
		{Numéro client indirect},
		CODE_CMI,
		NOM_CMI,
		{Nom du compte},
		{Client Indirect_ Groupe cible/Typologie générale},
		{Client Indirect_ Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée},
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Numéro du compte},
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Nom du compte},
		{ATC fictif Corrigé},
		{ATC fictif offre}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> deleteSecteurColumn2
deleteSecteurColumn2 derive({ATC Performance} = iif(!isNull({ATC Corrigé (vente directe)}) && {ATC fictif Corrigé}!=1 , {ATC Corrigé (vente directe)}, iif(!isNull({ATC offre} ) && {ATC fictif offre}!=1, {ATC offre}, {ATC livré}))) ~> atcPerformance
Select3 select(mapColumn(
		{affecte/non_affecte},
		{plateforme/vente directe},
		{origine de la ligne},
		year,
		month,
		{Code client livré},
		{code client plateforme livree},
		{code produit},
		quantite,
		ca,
		{Code postal du client livré},
		marque,

		{ID canal de distribution},
		{Nom du canal},
		{Diffus/Chantier},
		{document_vente (vente directe)},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé (vente directe)},
		{Donneur d'ordre (vente directe)},
		{Facture (vente directe)},
		{Type poste Facture (vente directe)},
		{Numéro offre},
		{ATC Corrigé (vente directe)},
		{ATC offre},
		{ATC livré},
		{ATC Performance},
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Motif commande (vente directe)},
		{Type de facture (vente directe)},
		N1groupe,
		N2groupe,
		N3groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N1groupedesignation,
		N2groupedesignation,
		N3groupedesignation,
		N4groupedesignation,
		N5groupedesignation,
		N6groupedesignation,
		N7groupedesignation,
		N1localedesignation,
		N2localedesignation,
		N3localedesignation,
		N4localedesignation,
		N5localedesignation,
		N6localedesignation,
		N7localedesignation,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		{Hiérarchgroupe},
		{Hiérarchlocale},
		{Numéro du compte},
		{EPS_Nom du compte},
		{EPS_Groupe cible/Typologie générale},
		{EPS_Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée},
		{EPS_Compte principal: Numéro du compte},
		{EPS_Compte principal: Nom du compte},
		Client,
		{Numéro client indirect},
		CODE_CMI,
		NOM_CMI,
		{Nom du compte},
		{Client Indirect_ Groupe cible/Typologie générale},
		{Client Indirect_ Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée},
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Numéro du compte},
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Nom du compte},
		NoATC,
		ATC,
		DRCde,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		{ATC fictif Corrigé},
		{ATC fictif offre}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> deleteColumns
atcPerformance select(mapColumn(
		{affecte/non_affecte},
		{plateforme/vente directe},
		{origine de la ligne},
		year,
		month,
		{Code client livré},
		{code client plateforme livree},
		{code produit},
		quantite,
		ca,
		{Code postal du client livré},
		marque,
		{ID marque},
		{ID canal de distribution},
		{Nom du canal},
		{Diffus/Chantier},
		{document_vente (vente directe)},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé (vente directe)},
		{Donneur d'ordre (vente directe)},
		{Facture (vente directe)},
		{Type poste Facture (vente directe)},
		{Numéro offre},
		{ATC Corrigé (vente directe)},
		{ATC offre},
		{ATC livré},
		{ATC Performance},

		Matricule,
		{Motif commande (vente directe)},
		{Type de facture (vente directe)},
		N1groupe,

		N1groupedesignation,

		N3groupedesignation,
		N4groupedesignation,
		N5groupedesignation,
		N6groupedesignation,
		N7groupedesignation,
		N1localedesignation,
		N2localedesignation,
		N3localedesignation,
		N4localedesignation,
		N5localedesignation,
		N6localedesignation,
		N7localedesignation,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		{Hiérarchgroupe},
		{Hiérarchlocale},
		{Numéro du compte},
		{EPS_Nom du compte},
		{EPS_Groupe cible/Typologie générale},
		{EPS_Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée},
		{EPS_Compte principal: Numéro du compte},
		{EPS_Compte principal: Nom du compte},
		Client,
		{Numéro client indirect},
		CODE_CMI,
		NOM_CMI,
		{Nom du compte},
		{Client Indirect_ Groupe cible/Typologie générale},
		{Client Indirect_ Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée},
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Numéro du compte},
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Nom du compte}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> placerATCperformance
placerATCperformance, RenameClientDirect join({Code client livré} == {Client Direct},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinClientDirect
MapDrifted2 select(mapColumn(
		{Client Direct} = Client,
		{Client Direct - Hiérarchie N1 SAP } = {_c4},
		{Client Direct - Hiérarchie N2 SAP } = {_c6}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameSAP
deleteColumns2, RenameClientIndirect join({Numéro client indirect} == {Client Indirect},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinClientIndirect
ExtractionSAP derive({_c2} = toString(byName('_c2')),
		{_c4} = toString(byName('_c4')),
		{_c6} = toString(byName('_c6')),
		{_c8} = toString(byName('_c8')),
		{_c10} = toString(byName('_c10')),
		{_c18} = toString(byName('_c18')),
		{_c22} = toString(byName('_c22')),
		{_c24} = toString(byName('_c24')),
		{_c26} = toString(byName('_c26')),
		{_c28} = toString(byName('_c28')),
		{_c30} = toString(byName('_c30')),
		{_c32} = toString(byName('_c32')),
		{_c34} = toString(byName('_c34')),
		{_c36} = toString(byName('_c36')),
		{_c39} = toString(byName('_c39')),
		{_c41} = toString(byName('_c41')),
		{_c43} = toString(byName('_c43'))) ~> MapDrifted2
JoinClientDirect select(mapColumn(
		{affecte/non_affecte},
		{plateforme/vente directe},
		{origine de la ligne},
		year,
		month,
		{Code client livré},
		{code client plateforme livree},
		{code produit},
		quantite,
		ca,
		{Code postal du client livré},
		marque,
		{ID marque},
		{ID canal de distribution},
		{Nom du canal},
		{Diffus/Chantier},
		{document_vente (vente directe)},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé (vente directe)},
		{Donneur d'ordre (vente directe)},
		{Facture (vente directe)},
		{Type poste Facture (vente directe)},
		{Numéro offre},
		{ATC Corrigé (vente directe)},
		{ATC offre},
		{ATC livré},
		{ATC Performance},
		NomATC,
		Matricule,
		{Motif commande (vente directe)},
		{Type de facture (vente directe)},
		N1groupe,
		N2groupe,
		N3groupe,
		N4groupe,
		N5groupe,
		N6groupe,
		N7groupe,
		N1groupedesignation,
		N2groupedesignation,
		N3groupedesignation,
		N4groupedesignation,
		N5groupedesignation,
		N6groupedesignation,
		N7groupedesignation,
		N1localedesignation,
		N2localedesignation,
		N3localedesignation,
		N4localedesignation,
		N5localedesignation,
		N6localedesignation,
		N7localedesignation,
		N1locale,
		N2locale,
		N3locale,
		N4locale,
		N5locale,
		N6locale,
		N7locale,
		{Hiérarchgroupe},
		{Hiérarchlocale},
		{Numéro du compte},
		{EPS_Nom du compte},
		{EPS_Groupe cible/Typologie générale},
		{EPS_Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée},
		{EPS_Compte principal: Numéro du compte},
		{EPS_Compte principal: Nom du compte},
		Client,
		{Numéro client indirect},
		CODE_CMI,
		NOM_CMI,
		{Nom du compte},
		{Client Indirect_ Groupe cible/Typologie générale},
		{Client Indirect_ Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée},
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Numéro du compte},
		{Client Indirect_  Compte principal: Nom du compte},
		{Client Direct - Hiérarchie N1 SAP },
		{Client Direct - Hiérarchie N2 SAP }
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> deleteColumns2
JoinATCDR select(mapColumn(
		{affecte/non_affecte},
		{plateforme/vente directe},
		{origine de la ligne},
		year,
		month,
		{Code client livré},
		{code client plateforme livree},
		{code produit},
		quantite,
		ca,
		{Code postal du client livré},
		marque,
		{ID marque},
		{ID canal de distribution},
		{Nom du canal},
		{Diffus/Chantier},
		{document_vente (vente directe)},

		{Client Direct - Hiérarchie N2 SAP },
		{Client Indirect - Hiérarchie N1 SAP},
		{Client Indirect - Hiérarchie N2 SAP}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> deleteColumns3
RenameSAP aggregate(groupBy({Client Direct}),
	{Client Direct - Hiérarchie N1 SAP } = first({Client Direct - Hiérarchie N1 SAP }),
		{Client Direct - Hiérarchie N2 SAP } = first({Client Direct - Hiérarchie N2 SAP })) ~> AgregateClient
AgregateClient select(mapColumn(
		{Client Direct},
		{Client Direct - Hiérarchie N1 SAP },
		{Client Direct - Hiérarchie N2 SAP }
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameClientDirect
AgregateClient select(mapColumn(
		{Client Indirect} = {Client Direct},
		{Client Indirect - Hiérarchie N1 SAP} = {Client Direct - Hiérarchie N1 SAP },
		{Client Indirect - Hiérarchie N2 SAP} = {Client Direct - Hiérarchie N2 SAP }
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameClientIndirect
deleteColumns3 select(mapColumn(
		{affecte/non_affecte},

		{origine de la ligne},
		year,

	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnDPT2
columnDPT2 derive(yearmonth = year+month,
		{ATC Corrigé} = {ATC Performance}) ~> newColumns
JoinClientIndirect derive({Diffus/Chantier} = iif({ID canal de distribution}=="43", "Chantier", "Diffus")) ~> diffusChantier
uniqueNoATC select(mapColumn(
		NoATC,
		ATC,
		DRCde,
		FirstName,
		LastName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endSecteurFictifs
secteurFictif aggregate(groupBy(NoATC),
	ATC = last(ATC),
		DRCde = last(DRCde),
		FirstName = last(FirstName),
		LastName = last(LastName)) ~> uniqueNoATC
newColumns filter(isNull({ATC offre}) && isNull({ATC livré}) && isNull({ATC Corrigé})) ~> Filter1
Filter1 aggregate(groupBy({plateforme/vente directe}),
	count = count({plateforme/vente directe})) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate3 select(mapColumn(
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		DR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endAtc
refAtcinput select(mapColumn(
		ATC,
		DR,
		NomATC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(ATC),
	DR = first(DR),
		NomATC = first(NomATC)) ~> Aggregate3

Select2 derive({ATC Performance} = toString(toInteger({ATC Performance}))) ~> atcPerformancecast
atcPerformancecast sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Clé Référentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Clé EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		DR_x as string,
		matches as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		DR_y as string,
		{Secteur prime} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Secteur DEC} as string,
		Rallye as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		{Code postal} as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['base commerciale.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outFinale
newColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['BaseCommercialeDTP2.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outDTP2
